# stacklet_api_key (Data Source)

Retrieve information about an API key by its identity.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "stacklet_api_key" "example" {
  identity = "my-api-key-identity"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `identity` (String) The identity of the API key to look up.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the API key.
- `expires_at` (String) The timestamp when the API key expires (RFC3339 format).
- `id` (String) The GraphQL Node ID of the API key.
- `revoked_at` (String) The timestamp when the API key was revoked (RFC3339 format).
